name: Traptrix Pudica
effectText: Unaffected by the effects of "Hole" Normal Traps. You can only use each of the following effects of "Traptrix Pudica" once per turn. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Traptrip Garden" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Special Summoned monster your opponent controls; banish it, also during the next Standby Phase, your opponent can Special Summon 1 of their banished monsters.
